name: Disable Check Comment Flood
author: Bangbay Siboliban

sections.description: Disables the Check Comment Flood feature so comments can be post-dated. If your visitors are receiving the message, “You are posting comments too quickly. Slow down.” while posting, this plugin disables that function.
sections.installation:
1. Upload disable-check-comment-flood.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is it a good idea to disable the Check Comment Flood feature?

There are pros and cons, but you may find it useful to disable the feature if you edit comments or have a different way of using comments.

short_description: Disables the Check Comment Flood feature so comments can be post-dated.
